extends BaseAccount
implements Transaction
    A class representing ITC322 Assignment 1 Task 2 SavingsAccount. This class extends abstract class developed in Task 1 of this assignment.

      • SavingsAccount

        public SavingsAccount(java.lang.String owner)
        Constructor, calls the superclass constructor, passing the string parameter owner. The super class constructor generates unique account number and zeroes balance.
        Parameters:
        owner - - String value of owners name

    • Method Detail

      • deposit

        public boolean deposit(double amount)
        Makes a deposit. Implementations will at least verify the amount is positive before making the deposit.
        Specified by:
        deposit in class BaseAccount
        Parameters:
        amount - the amount to deposit
        Returns:
        true if amount is positive otherwise false

      • withdraw

        public boolean withdraw(double amount)
        Makes a withdrawal from the account balance.
        Precondition:
        amount >= 0;
        balance >= amount;
        Postcondition:
        balance is reduced by amount.
        Specified by:
        withdraw in interface Transaction
        Parameters:
        amount - the amount to withdraw
        Returns:
        returns true if balance is adjusted.

      • addInterest

        public boolean addInterest(double interestRate)
        Accept interest rate value
        Precondition:
        interestRate >= 0;
        Postcondition:
        will increase the magnitude of the balance using the interest rate.
        Parameters:
        interestRate - - is the positive amount that the balance will be adjusted by.
        Returns:
        returns true if balance is adjusted.
